      void makeTurn()
      Puts symbol on board, calls for redraw of board and sends message about move to server.
      void playTheGame(java.lang.String message)
      Method is parsing message from server ,other than rules, that looks like HEADER(;OTHERINFO)+, text in brackets is optional, then sends appropriate response to window and waits for user input.
      void proccesMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Method is processing messeges with rules of the game such as borad size, number of symbols to get a point and player symbol that will represent his moves.

      • lookAfterThisGame

        private void lookAfterThisGame()
